summary: A fantastical journey into the world of a ten-year-old girl who, following a playground skirmish, is given the weirdest punishment in the history of weird punishments.
cast: Federica Lacaño|María Mendive|César Troncoso|Cristina Morán|Petru Valenski|Roberto Suárez|Gimena Fajardo|Florencia Zabaleta|Guillermina Pardo|Lucía Parrilla|Marcel Keoroglian|Pedro Cruz|Ana González|Jhonny Hendrix|Edgar Pedraza|Claudia Prezioso|Samuel Sadovnik|Stephany Sánchez
keywords: character name as title|film within a film|punishment|envelope|nightmare
title: Anina
